name: "We persist together" Tshirt
description:
My " "We Persist together " Tshirt 1/2 of proceeds go to charities supporting Japan. Price starts at 40$ But, if you want to donate more than that, and get the shirt just Email: phenmedia@gmail.com to donate a specific amount
 緒に頑張ろう！ “We persist together” - is a greeting being used in Japan during this crisis time.

name: Japan Relief Poster 11x17
description:
My print for the Japan crisis, 1/2 of profits go to charities assisting Japan. *If you would like to donate more than the price listed to the cause, email phenmedia@gmail.com noting your specific amount.

This size is 11/17 * 
*custom sizes available on request

On the print is the phrase 緒に頑張ろう！ “We persist together” - is a greeting being used in Japan during this crisis time.

."As an artist- I wanted to create something that people could have to remind them of the events in Japan, as memory, a symbol and a commemoration. I am donating half of sales to charities and organizations helping in Japan" 
- Ben Phen
